title: 10 RP SHORT FOR CASS CHROMA!!
body:
I really want this cass chroma, I dont have enough to buy an actual skin but I plan on playing a lot of cass and would like something, anything other than standard cass skin, played around with my refunds and bought a skin for another champ thinking i'd have enought for the chroma. I Guess I can't math all that well because I'm 10 RP short.{{champion:69}} 

Hope you like the flawless cass drawing and hope I get the 10 RP :D:D

replies.body: You may have a better chance sending a ticket to the Summoner support, they're the ones usually handing out small amounts of RP for drawings.

Yooooooo that's a great Cass! I love the boots reference, I always forget and try to buy boots with her and get heckin' confused when I can't xD!

Make sure to double check your account. You might just have enough for that chroma already. Lemme know which one you get!!!!
